title: Chill Netflix Clone
description: A fullstack Netflix clone app built with React and Express, using Zustand for front-end state management.
overview: Chill Netflix is a personal project aimed at replicating the core user experience of Netflix while focusing on performance and state management simplicity. The challenge was to handle a large catalog of media with smooth transitions and real-time user preference updates.
features: Dynamic movie catalog with horizontal scrolling
achievements: Optimized image loading for smooth infinite scrolling
Implemented a lightweight auth system with JWT
Created a robust API wrapper for TMDB integration
result: Successfully built a pixel-perfect clone that handles media metadata efficiently, providing a seamless browsing experience even on low-bandwidth connections.

title: Si Paling Persegi
description: An app to determine the area and perimeter of a square, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
overview: Si Paling Persegi is a educational tool designed to help students quickly calculate geometric properties of squares. The focus was on creating an extremely simple and intuitive interface that yields results instantly.
achievements: Ensured 100% accessible UI with proper ARIA labels
Designed a custom CSS-only animation for the result reveal
result: A highly usable tool that has been praised for its simplicity and clear visual feedback, perfectly serving its purpose as a quick geometric reference.
